## Feature Description

A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like.

## Use Case

Why is this feature useful? What problem does it solve?

Example:
- "When processing large WGS files, I need to..."
- "bedtools supports X, and GRIT should too because..."

## Proposed Solution

How you think this could be implemented. Include:
- Command-line interface (flags, options)
- Expected output format
- Performance considerations

## Alternatives Considered

Other approaches you've considered and why they don't work.

## Additional Context

- Link to bedtools documentation if this is a parity feature
- Example input/output if helpful
- Any performance requirements
